resources.string:
"Welcome to tranki! This is a no-frills, open source app." "It was programmed for my use; mass appeal was not my goal." "It's unpolished, potentially buggy, and not so simple to set up." "It'll help if you have some programming experience.

" "WHAT THIS APP IS FOR
" "When you're learning a new language blah blah blah

" "SETUP INSTRUCTIONS
" "1. Create a Google Cloud account if you haven't already. " "Sign into Google Cloud, and then click "console" in the top right.
" "2. Create a new project, naming it whatever you want. " "Select this project, using the dropdown in the upper left, " "such that it tells you that you're working in that project.
"
